summary: Add a basement to Breezehome in Whiterun! Simple addition to the house, adding an Enchanting table and adding another convenient Alchemy lab. Adds chests, mannequins, display cases and more! Original work by Korsakoff66
descriptionHtml:
Breezehome Basement v1

THIS MOD HAS BEEN EDITED BY ME (Knarley). ORIGINAL WORK BY Korsakoff66. 
If you\'d like to check out the original, check it out here:
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15298/


*DESCRIPTION*

Add a basement to Breezehome in Whiterun! This mod includes:
-1 Enchanting table
-1 Alchemy lab
-5 Mannequins
-8 Weapon Racks
-2 Weapon plaques
-5 Shield plaques
-9 Displaycases for daggers
-3 Large displaycases
-2 Bookshelves
-2 Chests
-1 Safe
-3 Strongboxes
-1 Knapsack


*HOW TO INSTALL*

- Copy the Data folder into the \"Skyrim\" folder.

Default path:
\"ProgramFiles/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim\"

~OR~

- Save zipped file to desktop. Using Nexus Mod Manager,
  use the \'Add Mod from File\' feature and select your
  zipped file. This will add this mod to your NMM and
  makes it easy to activate and deactivate.


*NOTE*

-After you have installed this mod, create a new save and reload
 this mod to fix issues with the mannequins and other minor bugs.


*WARNING*

-REMOVE all your stuff before you update or delete this mod!
author: Knarley
